title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - May 7, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - May 7, 2021
description:
Adam and Gary link up to discuss the news of the federal indictment that was unsealed against all four officers in the George Floyd case as well as a second indictment levied against Derek Chauvin for a separate incident with a teenager in 2017.

Watch this episode on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast
